snippet: Open underneath the basket, Draymond Green made a layup with 0.9 seconds left to give the Golden State Warriors a 97-95 win over the Miami Heat.
abstract: Golden State Warriors beat Miami Heat, 97-95; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Open underneath the basket, Draymond Green made a layup with 0.9 seconds left to give the Golden State Warriors a 97-95 win over the Miami Heat.

headline.seo: Warriors Beat Heat on Green’s Last-Second Layup
headline.main: Green Sneaks Through Defense, and Warriors Slip Past the Heat
headline.print_headline: Warriors Top Heat in Final Second
